trans-unit.source:
\n

Check constraints while data is being inserted.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxxxx xxxx xx xxxxx xxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
By default, constraints are not checked.

\n
trans-unit.target: Xx xxxxxxx$ xxxxxxxxxxx xxx xxx xxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Use the default values for all options.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxx xxx xxx xxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

When specified, cause the server to fire the insert triggers for the rows being inserted into the database.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xxxxxxxxx$ xxxxx xxx xxxxxx xx xxxx xxx xxxxxx xxxxxxxx xxx xxx xxxx xxxxx xxxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
When not specified, identity values are assigned by the destination.

\n
trans-unit.target: Xxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx$ xxxxxxxx xxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Preserve null values in the destination table regardless of the settings for default values.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
When not specified, null values are replaced by default values where applicable.

\n
trans-unit.target: Xxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx$ xxxx xxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxx xx xxxxxxx xxxxxx xxxxx xxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Obtain a bulk update lock for the duration of the bulk copy operation.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxx x xxxx xxxxxx xxxx xxx xxx xxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
When not specified, row locks are used.

\n
trans-unit.target: Xxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx$ xxx xxxxx xxx xxxx.$$x$$x
